title: Infrastructure at Unauthorized
author: VD
content_html:
Don’t worry if you happen to notice large swaths of videos disappearing from Unauthorized over the next three days. They’ll be back up soon. Due to our unexpected – and unprecedented success – we need to make some changes in order to provide room for our continued growth. We’ll be working on the site throughout the weekend, so don’t be alarmed by any anomalies you notice.

Thanks to all of the subscribers for the strong support. For more information, watch tonight’s Darkstream at 7 PM EST.
